comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Street View It's called Old Maids Cottage. "Old Maids Cottage also has a charming history. Dating originally from 1765, it was once home to three very pretty young ladies whose story was later celebrated in a poem. They were so choosey about their perspective husbands that they ended up unmarried and known as the Three Old Maids of Lee." (from www.oldmaidscottage.co.uk/) Nothing Swiss in this IMO.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: B-59:  Thank you for the correction on the cottage name.  We'll include this information next time we update the catalog record.
